filmography.title: China Seas
filmography.role_description: A British aristocrat and former lover of the ship's captain, creating tension aboard a dangerous voyage.
filmography.plot: The captain of a steamer traveling from Hong Kong to Singapore risks his life and ship to protect a gold shipment from pirates.

filmography.title: Craig's Wife
filmography.role_description: A cold, domineering housewife who values her impeccably kept home more than her husband's happiness.
filmography.plot: A woman is so obsessed with her house and possessions that she alienates her husband and everyone around her.

filmography.title: Under Two Flags
filmography.role_description: A refined British aristocrat who vies for the affection of a legionnaire against a fiery camp follower.
filmography.plot: A British aristocrat joins the French Foreign Legion to escape his past and becomes involved with a cafe singer.

filmography.title: Night Must Fall
filmography.role_description: A repressed young woman living with her invalid aunt who becomes suspicious of a charming handyman.
filmography.plot: A woman slowly realizes that the charming young man employed by her aunt may be a brutal axe murderer.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Top Ten Films

filmography.title: The Citadel
filmography.role_description: The supportive schoolteacher wife of an idealistic young doctor who watches him lose his way in the medical establishment.
filmography.plot: An idealistic doctor starts out treating the poor in a Welsh mining village but is seduced by the wealth of London society.

filmography.title: Four's a Crowd
filmography.role_description: A sharp-witted newspaper reporter who gets tangled in a romantic quadrangle involving her editor.
filmography.plot: A public relations man tries to improve the image of a hated millionaire while juggling romances with two women.

filmography.title: The Women
filmography.role_description: A gossiping, backstabbing socialite who delights in spreading rumors about her friends' marriages.
filmography.plot: A wealthy woman discovers her husband is having an affair with a shopgirl, leading to a divorce and a battle of wits among her social circle.

filmography.title: Fast and Loose
filmography.role_description: A rare books expert and amateur detective who solves crimes alongside her husband.
filmography.plot: A married couple of rare book dealers get involved in a murder mystery when a Shakespearean manuscript is stolen.

filmography.title: His Girl Friday
filmography.role_description: A lightning-fast talking newspaper reporter who tries to leave the business but gets pulled back for one last scoop by her ex-husband editor.
filmography.plot: A newspaper editor uses every trick in the book to keep his ace reporter ex-wife from remarrying.

filmography.title: Hired Wife
filmography.role_description: An efficient secretary who agrees to a marriage of convenience with her boss to help him protect his business assets.
filmography.plot: A boss marries his secretary to protect his business, but she plans to make the marriage real.

filmography.title: No Time for Comedy
filmography.role_description: An actress wife who tries to keep her playwright husband grounded when he is seduced by a socialite into writing serious drama.
filmography.plot: A playwright of successful comedies is persuaded by a sophisticated woman to write a tragedy, threatening his marriage.

filmography.title: Design for Scandal
filmography.role_description: A stern female judge who becomes the target of a reporter attempting to compromise her to save his boss from a lawsuit.
filmography.plot: A reporter tries to frame a female judge in a scandal to help his publisher avoid high alimony payments.

filmography.title: My Sister Eileen
filmography.role_description: A witty, sensible writer who moves to Greenwich Village with her beautiful, naive younger sister.
filmography.plot: Two sisters from Ohio move to a basement apartment in New York City to pursue their careers and find romance.

filmography.title: Take a Letter, Darling
filmography.role_description: A high-powered advertising executive who hires a male secretary to keep her suitors at bay, reversing traditional gender roles.
filmography.plot: A female executive hires a male secretary to protect her from professional jealousy and romantic entanglements.

filmography.title: What a Woman!
filmography.role_description: A top literary agent who tries to manage the career of a shy author while dealing with a magazine profiler.
filmography.plot: A literary agent sells the film rights to a book and decides to play the lead role herself, leading to romantic complications.

filmography.title: Roughly Speaking
filmography.role_description: A feminist and mother who navigates financial struggles and family life across four decades of American history.
filmography.plot: A biographical comedy-drama about a free-spirited woman who raises a large family through the ups and downs of the 20th century.

filmography.title: Sister Kenny
filmography.role_description: The real-life Australian bush nurse who fought the medical establishment to introduce a revolutionary treatment for polio.
filmography.plot: The true story of Sister Elizabeth Kenny, who fought to gain recognition for her controversial treatment of polio.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Actress; Golden Globe: Win – Best Actress

filmography.title: Mourning Becomes Electra
filmography.role_description: A vengeful daughter in post-Civil War New England who engages in a psychological war with her mother.
filmography.plot: A daughter seeks revenge on her mother for the murder of her father in this adaptation of Eugene O'Neill's play.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Actress; Golden Globe: Win – Best Actress

filmography.title: The Velvet Touch
filmography.role_description: A Broadway comedienne who accidentally kills her producer and tries to hide her guilt while starring in a serious drama.
filmography.plot: A famous actress kills her producer in an argument and lets another actress take the blame while she suffers from guilt.

filmography.title: Tell It to the Judge
filmography.role_description: A lawyer aiming for a judgeship who must deal with her ex-husband trying to win her back.
filmography.plot: A lawyer trying to become a federal judge is hindered by her ex-husband who wants to reconcile.

filmography.title: Never Wave at a WAC
filmography.role_description: A Washington socialite who joins the Women's Army Corps hoping to be stationed in Paris, but ends up in basic training.
filmography.plot: A socialite joins the Army to be near her boyfriend but finds herself subjected to the rigors of basic training.

filmography.title: Picnic
filmography.role_description: A frustrated, middle-aged schoolteacher who desperately seeks marriage and erupts in a memorable emotional breakdown.
filmography.plot: A drifter arrives in a small Kansas town and complicates the lives of his former college friend and the women in the town.

filmography.title: Auntie Mame
filmography.role_description: An eccentric, flamboyant bohemian who raises her orphaned nephew with an unconventional zest for life.
filmography.plot: An orphan goes to live with his free-spirited aunt, whose lifestyle clashes with the executor of his father's estate.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Actress; Golden Globe: Win – Best Actress (Comedy/Musical)

filmography.title: A Majority of One
filmography.role_description: A Jewish widow from Brooklyn who travels to Japan and forms an unlikely friendship with a Japanese industrialist.
filmography.plot: A Jewish widow falls in love with a Japanese businessman, despite the objections of her daughter and son-in-law.

filmography.title: Gypsy
filmography.role_description: The ultimate stage mother who ruthlessly pushes her daughters into vaudeville stardom at any cost.
filmography.plot: The rise of burlesque star Gypsy Rose Lee and her complex relationship with her domineering mother, Rose.

filmography.title: The Trouble with Angels
filmography.role_description: A strict but wise Mother Superior at a Catholic boarding school who matches wits with two rebellious students.
filmography.plot: Two high-spirited students at a convent school constantly challenge the patience of the Mother Superior.
